channel.title: healthTest
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from healthTest, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AstraZeneca makes deal with White House to lower drug prices
item.description: The U.K.-based drugmaker became the second to strike a deal with the Trump administration as part of the president's push to rein in U.S. drug prices.

item.title: This Nobel Peace Prize front-runner didn't win -- but did get the 'alternative Nobel'
item.description: The Sudan Emergency Response Rooms was considered a front-runner for the Nobel Peace Prize winner this year and last. Here's their story.

item.title: GLP 1s and Libido: An Effect That May Fly Under the Radar
item.description: GLP 1 therapies are effective but may dampen sexual desire in some patients. Here’s why and how to help mitigate the issue. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Could Oral Microbiome Test Indicate Pancreatic Cancer Risk?

item.title: How Dentists Could Help Close the HPV Vaccination Gap
